description:
When viewing a Client, the list of DataTables does not scroll in the proper direction. Each button should scroll in its corresponding direction, but instead, both the right and the left buttons scroll in the right direction.
On the top nav-bar, click on Clients > Clients.
Select any Client from the list of clients.
Right below the Client's name, there should be a horizontal list of DataTable names. These include "General", "Address", "Family Members", 
There should be two arrow buttons on each side of the list, left (<) and right (>). Click on these buttons to scroll the list.
Expected Behavior
Clicking the right (>) button should scroll the list in the right direction. Clicking the left (<) button should scroll the list in the left direction.
Actual Behavior
Clicking the right (>) button scrolls the list in the right direction. Clicking the left (<) button also scrolls the list in the right direction.

### How to Submit

Submit a pull request linking to the issue and include the link to the pull request in your submission through the GCI Portal.
name: Mifos - Bug Fix: When viewing a Client, scroll button does not move in the proper direction
